<!doctype html>
<html>
 <head>
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="style.css">
 </head>
 <body>
  <button class="x">X</button>
  <button class="y">Y</button>
  <button class="b">B</button>
  <button class="a">A</button>
 </body>
</html>
